00312 typedef enum {
00313     /* Don't call request again until new SETUP                              */
00314     CSL_HID_REQUEST_DONE = 0,
00315     /* STALL the control endpoint                                            */
00316     CSL_HID_REQUEST_STALL,
00317     /* Send a 0 length IN packet                                             */
00318     CSL_HID_REQUEST_SEND_ACK,
00319     /* Prepare to receive 0 length OUT packet                                */
00320     CSL_HID_REQUEST_GET_ACK,
00321     /* Notify handler when IN data has been transmitted                      */
00322     CSL_HID_REQUEST_DATA_IN,
00323     /* Notify handler when OUT data has been received                        */
00324     CSL_HID_REQUEST_DATA_OUT
00325 } CSL_HidRequestRet;
00326

00332     CSL_HID_MEDIACCESS_OVERFLOW,
00334     CSL_HID_MEDIACCESS_SUCCESS,
00336     CSL_HID_MEDIACCESS_NOTPRESENT,
00338     CSL_HID_MEDIACCESS_WRITEPROTECT,
00340     CSL_HID_MEDIACCESS_BADMEDIA
00341 } CSL_HidMediaStatus;
00342 
00346 typedef enum {
00348     CSL_HID_UNLOCK = 0,
00350     CSL_HID_LOCK
00351 } CSL_HidMediaLockStatus;
